Ogress Shamans are found in the Corsair Cove Dungeon.

These ogresses only utilise magical attacks. They share a similar drop table to Ogress Warriors.

Ogress Shaman can only reach 4 squares away with their magic attack, which means you can safespot them with ranged or magic as long as you are 5 or more squares away from them.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Despite the Shaman attacking with what appears to be Wind Bolt, the sound effects used are the ones for Earth Bolt.
